headline: Schist Laser Cleaning

description: Laser cleaning of schist leverages the differential absorption of laser energy between contaminants and the complex silicate mineral matrix. The optimal parameters are tuned to avoid thermal shock and...

about.name: Schist
about.description: Schist material for laser cleaning applications

mainEntity.name: How to Laser Clean Schist
mainEntity.description: Process for laser cleaning Schist using 1064 nm (Nd:YAG fundamental), 532 nm (Nd:YAG second harmonic) wavelength
